seo.title: Kamfanin Kera Masana'antu ta atomatik & Kula da Panel | PLC SCADA DCS Systems | Injiniya na Powerton Indiya
seo.description: Babban kamfanin sarrafa masana'antu ta atomatik a Indiya wanda ya ƙware a masana'antar kera panel na lantarki, shirye-shiryen PLC, haɗin tsarin SCADA, injiniyan DCS, da hanyoyin sarrafa tsari ta atomatik. Yin hidima ga masana'antar harhada magunguna, tashar wutar lantarki, mai da gas, masana'antu, da sinadarai. An tabbatar da ISO tare da ƙwarewar shekaru 15+. Ƙwararre a cikin sarrafa kansa na Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, ABB. Tallafi na 24/7 | Shawarwari kyauta | Noida, Indiya

seo.title: Game da Injiniya na Powerton | Kamfanin Kera Masana'antu ta atomatik & Kula da Panel Mai Takaddun ISO Tun 2008
seo.description: Injiniya na Powerton Pvt. Ltd. - Kamfanin sarrafa masana'antu ta atomatik mai takardar shaidar ISO 9001:2015 tare da ƙwarewar shekaru 15+ a cikin kera panel na kulawa ta lantarki, tsarin PLC SCADA DCS, kayan aiki, da sarrafa tsari ta atomatik. Babban mai haɗa tsarin sarrafa kansa yana hidimar masana'antar harhada magunguna, tashar wutar lantarki, mai da gas, sinadarai, masana'antu, da masana'antar kula da ruwa a duk faɗin Indiya. Wanda ya lashe kyautar mai bada hanyoyin injiniya tare da ayyuka 1200+ masu nasara. Ƙwararren ƙungiya a cikin Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, Honeywell, ABB fasahohin sarrafa kansa. Hedkwatar tana Noida tare da faɗin sabis na Indiya.

hero.title: Ƙwarewar Injiniya Tun 2008
hero.subtitle: Abokin Hulɗarku Amintacce a cikin Masana'antu ta atomatik da Maganin Injiniya na Lantarki

story.title: Tarihinmu da Hangen Nesa
story.description1: An kafa shi a cikin 2008 tare da hangen nesa don ƙarfafa masana'antu ta hanyar ƙirƙira da kyau, Injiniya na Powerton ya kasance kan gaba wajen sarrafa masana'antu da mafita na injiniyan lantarki. Tafiyarmu ta fara ne da manufa mai sauƙi amma mai ƙarfi: don samar da mafita na injiniya na yankan da ke haifar da ci gaban masana'antu da ingancin aiki.
story.description2: A cikin shekarun da suka gabata, mun girma daga ƙaramin kamfanin injiniya zuwa amintaccen abokin tarayya ga masana'antu a duk faɗin China da duniya. Ƙungiyarmu ta ƙwararrun injiniyoyi da ƙwararrun fasaha suna aiki tuƙuru don samar da mafita waɗanda ba kawai suka cika ba har ma sun zarce tsammanin abokan cinikinmu.

mission.title: Manufarmu
mission.description: Don samar da sabbin hanyoyi, abin dogaro, da dorewa na injiniya waɗanda ke baiwa abokan cinikinmu damar cimma ƙwarewar aiki da haifar da ci gaban masana'antu.

vision.title: Hangarmu
vision.description: Don zama babban mai ba da sabis na sarrafa masana'antu da mafita na injiniyan lantarki, wanda aka gane don ƙwarewarmu ta fasaha, inganci, da sadaukarwa ga nasarar abokin ciniki.

cta.title: Shirye don Fara Aikin ku?

seo.title: Fayil ɗin Ayyukan Kera Masana'antu ta atomatik | Nazarin Shari'a na Kula da Panel | Aiwatar da PLC SCADA | Injiniya na Powerton
seo.description: Bincika 1200+ ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu masu nasara a duk faɗin Indiya - sarrafa masana'antar harhada magunguna, tsarin kula da tashar wutar lantarki, sarrafa barasa, ayyukan EPC na hasken rana, SCADA na kula da ruwa, sarrafa masana'antar abin sha, da kayayyakin more rayuwa na cajin EV. Nazarin shari'a na gaske wanda ke nuna shirye-shiryen PLC, haɗin tsarin SCADA, aiwatar da DCS, da shigar da panel na kula da lantarki ga manyan kamfanoni kamar IOCL, Dalmia, Coca-Cola, Reliance, IIT Bhubaneswar. Ƙwarewar da aka tabbatar a cikin sarrafa tsari, kayan aiki, da ayyukan masana'antu masu turnkey.
seo.keywords: ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu Indiya, ayyukan shigar da panel na kulawa, nazarin shari'a na aikin PLC SCADA, ayyukan sarrafa harhada magunguna, nazarin shari'a na sarrafa tashar wutar lantarki, ayyukan sarrafa barasa, ayyukan EPC na hasken rana Indiya, ayyukan SCADA na kula da ruwa, sarrafa masana'antar abin sha, ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu, nazarin shari'a na sarrafa tsari, ayyukan panel na kulawa da lantarki, ayyukan kayan aiki Indiya, fayil ɗin aikin sarrafa kansa, aiwatar da IoT na masana'antu, ayyukan sarrafa masana'anta, ayyukan haɗin tsarin sarrafa kansa, sabunta tsarin kulawa, nazarin shari'a na sarrafa shuka, ayyukan ƙaura na SCADA, ayyukan aiwatar da DCS, ayyukan haɓaka HMI, shigar da panel na VFD, ayyukan cibiyar kula da mota, ayyukan sarrafa kansa na turnkey, ayyukan injiniyan lantarki Indiya, ayyukan kula da tsari, ayyukan lantarki na masana'antu, ayyukan gyaran sarrafa kansa, ayyukan kera panel na kulawa, gudanar da aikin injiniya, ayyukan ba da shawarwari na sarrafa kansa, aiwatar da aikin masana'antu, ayyukan ƙaddamar da sarrafa kansa, haɓaka tsarin kulawa, ayyukan sabunta shuka, ayyukan horar da sarrafa kansa, nasarar aiwatar da sarrafa kansa, ambaton sarrafa masana'antu, fayil ɗin masana'antar panel na kulawa, nazarin shari'a na kamfanin sarrafa kansa, ayyukan hanyoyin injiniya

seo.title: Nemi Ƙididdiga & Kalkuleta Kuɗi - Maganin Kera Masana'antu ta atomatik | Injiniya na Powerton
seo.description: Nemi cikakken ƙididdiga don sarrafa tsari, bangarori masu sarrafa lantarki, kayan aiki, tsarin SCADA, shirye-shiryen PLC, da hanyoyin injiniya na al'ada. Yi amfani da kalkuleta kuɗin mu mai ma'amala don ƙididdiga nan take tare da farashi takamaiman masana'antu. Akwai shawarwari kyauta. Muna hidimar duk Indiya tare da farashi na gasa da lokacin amsawa na awanni 24-48.

careerGrowth.description: Tsarin ci gaban aiki tare da sake dubawa na yau da kullun da damar haɓakawa.

workLifeBalance.description: Lokutan aiki masu sassauƙa da cikakkun fa'idodin kiwon lafiya ga ma'aikata da iyalai.

teamCulture.title: Al'adar Ƙungiya
teamCulture.description: Yanayin aiki na haɗin kai tare da membobin ƙungiyar tallafi da buɗe sadarwa.

recognitionRewards.description: Ƙarfafawa bisa aiki, kari, da shirye-shiryen ganewa don aiki mai kyau.

innovationFocus.title: Mayar da Hankali ga Ƙirƙira
innovationFocus.description: Yi aiki akan fasahohi masu yankan-kaifi da sabbin hanyoyin sarrafa masana'antu.

whyJoinUs.title: Me yasa Zaɓi Injiniya na Powerton?
whyJoinUs.description: Kasance wani ɓangare na ƙungiya mai ƙwazo da ke tsara makomar sarrafa masana'antu da injiniyan lantarki

cta.title: Shin Kun Shirya Don Fara Tafiyar Injiniya?
cta.description: Shiga cikin ƙungiyar mu na injiniyoyi masu ƙirƙira kuma ku kasance wani ɓangare na ayyukan automatization na masana'antu masu ban sha'awa. Ɗauki mataki na gaba a cikin aikin ku tare da Powerton Engineering.

plcs.title: PLCs (Masu Kula da Dabaru Masu Shiryawa) - Sarrafa Masana'antu | Injiniya na Powerton
plcs.description: PLCs masu inganci daga manyan masana'antun: Siemens SIMATIC, Allen-Bradley CompactLogix, Schneider Modicon. Shirye-shiryen PLC na ƙwararru, shigarwa & tallafi a duk faɗin Indiya.
plcs.keywords: PLCs, masu kula da dabaru masu shiryawa, Siemens SIMATIC, Allen-Bradley CompactLogix, Schneider Modicon, masu kula da sarrafa masana'antu, shirye-shiryen PLC, sarrafa masana'anta

solarPanels.title: Panel ɗin Rana - Monocrystalline & Polycrystalline | Injiniya na Powerton
solarPanels.description: Panel ɗin hasken rana mai inganci: Monocrystalline (400W), Polycrystalline (320W), da Bifacial (450W). Cikakkun hanyoyin samar da makamashi mai hasken rana tare da tallafin shigarwa a duk faɗin Indiya.
solarPanels.keywords: panel ɗin hasken rana, panel ɗin hasken rana na monocrystalline, panel ɗin hasken rana na polycrystalline, panel ɗin hasken rana na bifacial, tsarin makamashi mai hasken rana, makamashi mai sabuntawa, shigar da hasken rana Indiya

scada.title: Tsarin SCADA - Sa ido & Kula da Masana'antu | Injiniya na Powerton
scada.description: Tsarin SCADA na ci gaba don sa ido na ainihi, samun bayanai, da sarrafa tsari. Cikakkun hanyoyin SCADA tare da haɗin HMI da iyawar samun dama ta nesa.
scada.keywords: tsarin SCADA, kula da kulawa, samun bayanai, sa ido kan masana'antu, sarrafa tsari, haɗin HMI, sa ido na nesa, software na SCADA
